import React from "react"; import { Fragment } from "react"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, Button, Alert,Card } from "react-bootstrap"; import { useState } from "react"; // import ProfileImageUpload from "./ProfileImageUpload"; // import "./ProfileImageUpload.css"; const UserProfilePage = () => { const [validated, setValidated] = useState(false); const onChange = () => { const password = document.querySelector("input[name=password]"); const confirm = document.querySelector("input[name=confirmPassword]"); if (confirm.value === password.value) { confirm.setCustomValidity(""); } else { confirm.setCustomValidity("Passwords do not match"); } }; const handleSubmit = (event) => { const form = event.currentTarget; if (form.checkValidity() === false) { event.preventDefault(); event.stopPropagation(); } setValidated(true); }; return (

); }; export default UserProfilePage;
